channel.title: Spike on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Spike on funPlantGenes

item.title: Bradi5g03300
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi5g03300 Gene Symbol: Bradi5g03300 Gene Name: UDP-Glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Using the model cereal species Brachypodium distachyon, we show that the Bradi5g03300 UGT converts DON into D3G in planta.

item.title: HvFEA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G042170 Gene Symbol: HvFEA4 Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: We further reveal that HvFEA4, as a transcription factor, potentially targets multiple pathways during reproductive development, including transcriptional control, phytohormone signaling, and redox status.

item.title: HvFT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvFT4 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T4 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: FLOWERING LOCUS T4 (HvFT4) delays flowering and decreases floret fertility in barley.

item.title: TaHDZipI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaHDZipI-2 Gene Name: Homeodomain leucine zipper class I-2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The homeodomain transcription factor TaHDZipI-2 from wheat regulates frost tolerance, flowering time and spike development in transgenic barley.

item.title: TaHOX4-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5A02G249000 Gene Symbol: TaHOX4-A Gene Name: HOMEOBOX4 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat FRIZZY PANICLE activates VERNALIZATION1-A (VRN1-A) and HOMEOBOX4-A (TaHOX4) to regulate spike development in wheat.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VER2 Gene Name: vernalization-related gene 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Vernalization-induced flowering in wheat is mediated by a lectin-like gene VER2.

item.title: WFZP-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G116900 Gene Symbol: WFZP-A Gene Name: FRIZZY PANICLE Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: WFZP is specifically expressed at the sites where the spikelet meristem and floral meristem are initiated, which differs from the expression patterns of its homologs FZP/BD1 in rice and maize, indicative of its functional divergence during species differentiation.

item.title: WFZP-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D02G118200 Gene Symbol: WFZP-D Gene Name: FRIZZY PANICLE Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: WFZP is specifically expressed at the sites where the spikelet meristem and floral meristem are initiated, which differs from the expression patterns of its homologs FZP/BD1 in rice and maize, indicative of its functional divergence during species differentiation.
